name: Flat Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on the bench with your feet on the floor.
Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower the bar to your mid-chest, keeping your elbows tucked at about a 45-degree angle.
Press the bar back up to the starting position.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Set a bench to a 30-45 degree incline.
Lie on the bench and grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Unrack the bar and lower it to your upper chest.
Press the bar back up until your arms are fully extended.

name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Secure your legs at the end of a decline bench.
Lie back and grip the bar with a medium-width grip.
Lift the bar from the rack and lower it to your lower chest.
Press the bar back to the starting position.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set a bench to a 30-45 degree incline.
Sit and place dumbbells on your thighs.
Kick the weights up to your shoulders and lie back.
Press the dumbbells up and together over your chest.
Lower them slowly with control.

name: Flat Dumbbell Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand.
Hold the dumbbells at the sides of your chest, palms facing forward.
Press the dumbbells up until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the dumbbells slowly to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Flyes
instructions: Lie on a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Press the weights above your chest.
With a slight bend in your elbows, lower the weights out to your sides in a wide arc.
Bring the weights back to the starting position using your chest muscles.

name: Pec Deck Fly
instructions: Sit on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Place your forearms on the padded levers or grab the handles.
Bring the levers together in a hugging motion, squeezing your chest.
Return slowly to the start.

name: Machine Chest Press
instructions: Sit on the machine and adjust the seat so the handles are at chest level.
Grab the handles and press forward until your arms are fully extended.
Return slowly to the starting position.

name: High-to-low Cable Crossover
instructions: Set pulleys to a high position.
Grab the handles and step forward to create tension.
With a slight bend in your elbows, pull the handles down and across your body.
Squeeze your chest at the peak contraction.

name: Push Up
instructions: Start in a high plank position with hands under your shoulders.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.
Push back up to the starting position, keeping your body in a straight line.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with the bar on your front shoulders, hands just outside shoulder-width.
Press the bar straight overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the bar back to your shoulders with control.

name: Seated Dumbbell Press
instructions: Sit on a bench with back support, holding dumbbells at shoulder height.
Press the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the dumbbells back to the starting position with control.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells at your sides with palms facing in.
With a slight bend in your elbows, raise the weights out to your sides until they reach shoulder height.
Lower with control.

name: Reverse Pec Deck
instructions: Sit facing the machine with your chest against the pad.
Grab the handles with an overhand grip.
Keeping your arms mostly straight, pull your arms back, squeezing your rear delts and upper back.
Return to the start with control.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand sideways to a low pulley cable machine.
Grab the handle with your outside hand.
Raise your arm out to the side until it's parallel to the floor.
Lower with control and repeat.

name: Pike Pushups
instructions: Get into a downward dog yoga position.
Bend your elbows to lower the top of your head towards the floor.
Press back up to the starting position.
Keep your legs as straight as possible.

name: Tricep Pushdown
instructions: Attach a straight bar or rope to a high pulley.
Grab the attachment with an overhand grip and push down until your arms are fully extended.
Keep your elbows pinned to your sides.
Slowly let the attachment return to the starting position.

name: Skull Crushers
instructions: Lie on a flat bench holding an EZ bar or barbell above your chest.
Lower the bar towards your forehead by bending only at the elbows.
Extend your arms to press the weight back to the start, focusing on the triceps contraction.

name: Dumbbell Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Sit on a bench and hold one dumbbell with both hands over your head.
Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Extend your arms to lift the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Keep your upper arms stationary throughout.

name: Dips
instructions: Use parallel bars or two sturdy chairs.
Lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows.
Push back up to the starting position.

name: Pull Ups
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than your shoulders.
Pull your chest up to the bar, leading with your chest and squeezing your back.
Lower yourself down with control.

name: Barbell Row
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Hinge at your hips until your torso is nearly parallel to the floor.
Pull the bar towards your lower chest/upper abdomen, squeezing your back muscles.
Lower the bar with control.

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee and one hand on a flat bench.
Hold a dumbbell in the other hand with your arm extended.
Pull the dumbbell up to the side of your chest, squeezing your back.
Lower the dumbbell with control.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit at the machine and grab the bar with a wide overhand grip.
Pull the bar down to your upper chest, keeping your torso upright.
Squeeze your lats at the bottom.
Slowly return the bar to the starting position.

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit at the cable row machine with your feet on the platform.
Grab the handle and pull it towards your abdomen, keeping your back straight.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Slowly extend your arms back to the start.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Lie under a sturdy table or a barbell in a rack.
Grab the edge with an overhand grip.
Keeping your body straight, pull your chest up to the table/bar.
Lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Stand holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, palms facing forward.
Curl the weights up towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows stationary.
Squeeze your biceps at the top.
Lower with control.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Stand holding a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral (hammer) grip.
Curl the weights up towards your shoulders, keeping your palms facing each other.
Squeeze at the top and lower with control.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Stand holding a barbell with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Keep your elbows close to your torso and curl the weight up towards your shoulders.
Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement.
Lower the barbell with control.

name: Preacher Curl Machine
instructions: Sit at a preacher curl machine and adjust the seat height.
Place the back of your upper arms on the pad and grab the handles.
Curl the weight up towards your shoulders.
Slowly lower the weight until your arms are almost fully extended.

name: Chin Ups
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Pull your chest up to the bar.
Focus on using your biceps to pull your body up.
Lower yourself down with control.

name: Barbell Squat
instructions: Place a barbell on your upper back.
Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly out.
Lower your hips down and back as if sitting in a chair, keeping your chest up.
Descend until your thighs are at least parallel to the floor.
Drive back up through your heels.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold one dumbbell vertically against your chest with both hands.
Stand with your feet slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower your hips down and back, keeping your chest up.
Drive back up to the starting position.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in the leg press machine and place your feet on the platform shoulder-width apart.
Push the platform away from you by extending your knees.
Lower the platform with control, do not let your lower back round off the pad.

name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit on the machine with your legs under the pad.
Extend your legs to lift the weight, squeezing your quads at the top.
Lower slowly with control.

name: Bodyweight Squat
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your hips down and back as if sitting in a chair.
Keep your chest up and back straight.
Push through your heels to return to the start.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold a barbell in front of your thighs.
Hinge at your hips, pushing them back while keeping your back straight and a slight bend in your knees.
Lower the bar until you feel a deep stretch in your hamstrings.
Return to the start by squeezing your glutes.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs.
Hinge at your hips, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent.
Lower the dumbbells towards the floor until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
Return to the starting position.

name: Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down on a leg curl machine (or sit in a seated version).
Curl the weight up by bending your knees and squeezing your hamstrings.
Lower with control.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Lift your hips off the floor until your body forms a straight line from your shoulders to your knees.
Squeeze your glutes and hamstrings at the top.
Lower your hips back down.

name: Hip Thrust
instructions: Sit on the floor with your upper back against a bench and a barbell across your hips.
Drive your hips up towards the ceiling, squeezing your glutes hard at the top.
Lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Place your upper back on a bench and hold a dumbbell across your hips.
With your knees bent, drive your hips up towards the ceiling.
Squeeze your glutes at the top and lower with control.

name: Glute Kickback Machine
instructions: Position yourself on the glute kickback machine.
Press the pad back with one leg, focusing on squeezing your glute.
Return to the starting position with control and repeat.

name: Cable Glute Kickback
instructions: Attach an ankle strap to a low pulley cable.
Face the machine and step back to create tension.
Hinge at your hips slightly, keeping your back straight.
Kick your leg straight back, squeezing your glute at the peak of the movement.
Lower with control.

name: Bodyweight Hip Thrust
instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor, hip-width apart.
Place your arms at your sides with palms down.
Drive through your heels to lift your hips towards the ceiling until your body forms a straight line from your shoulders to your knees.
Squeeze your glutes hard at the top.
Lower with control.

name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on a calf raise machine or a step with a weight.
Press up onto the balls of your feet as high as possible.
Hold the peak contraction, then slowly lower your heels below the level of the step.

name: Dumbbell Calf Raise
instructions: Stand holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Raise your heels off the floor, pressing onto the balls of your feet.
Hold the contraction at the top, then slowly lower your heels.

name: Barbell Calf Raise
instructions: Stand with a barbell on your upper back.
Place the balls of your feet on a raised surface.
Raise your heels as high as possible.
Lower your heels until you feel a stretch in your calves.

name: Bodyweight Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on the edge of a step with your heels hanging off.
Hold onto something for balance if needed.
Raise your heels as high as possible, squeezing your calves.
Slowly lower your heels below the level of the step to feel a stretch.
For more difficulty, perform one leg at a time.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar.
Raise your legs up as high as you can, keeping them straight or with a slight bend.
Lower with control.

name: Cable Crunch
instructions: Kneel in front of a high pulley with a rope attachment.
Grab the rope and pull it down so your hands are on either side of your head.
Crunch your torso downwards, bringing your elbows towards your knees.
Return to the starting position slowly.

name: Ab Crunch Machine
instructions: Sit in the ab crunch machine and select your weight.
Place your feet under the pads and grab the handles.
Crunch your upper body forward, contracting your abs.
Slowly return to the start.

name: Dumbbell Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Hold a single dumbbell across your chest with both hands.
Lift your shoulders off the floor, crunching your abs.
Keep your lower back pressed into the floor.
Lower with control.

name: Wrist Curls
instructions: Sit on a bench and rest your forearms on your thighs, with your wrists hanging off your knees.
Hold a light dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing up.
Curl your wrists upwards as far as possible.
Lower the dumbbells with control.

name: Barbell Wrist Curls
instructions: Sit on a bench and hold a barbell with both hands, palms up.
Rest your forearms on your thighs.
Lower the barbell as far as possible, then curl it up with your wrists.
Squeeze at the top of the movement.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: Hold a heavy dumbbell or kettlebell in each hand.
Walk for a set distance or time, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
This exercise primarily builds grip strength.

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Sit on the floor with your knees bent and feet slightly off the ground.
Lean back slightly to engage your core.
Twist your torso from side to side, touching your hands to the floor on each side.
For added difficulty, hold a weight.

name: Dumbbell Side Bends
instructions: Stand holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Bend your torso to the side, lowering the dumbbell towards the floor.
Use your obliques to pull your torso back to the starting position.
Complete all reps on one side before switching.

name: Cable Woodchoppers
instructions: Set a cable pulley to a high position.
Stand sideways to the machine and grab the handle with both hands.
Pull the handle down and across your body in a chopping motion.
Control the movement back to the start.
